text:
Belle: Gaston, I will never marry you.
Gaston: You'll change your mind, Belle!

Jasmine: Aladdin, where will we go next on the carpet?
Aladdin: Anywhere you want, Jasmine!

Aurora: I keep dreaming of someone I've never met.
Fairy Godmother: Dreams can be real, Aurora.

Lilo: Stitch, what's more important than 'ohana?
Stitch: Nothing, Lilo! 'Ohana means family.
